articles.description: The star of The Mauritanian and the BBC drama The Serpent had spent a decade turning down terrorist roles, he tells Alexandra Pollard. The role of Mohamedou Ould Slahi, who was tortured in Guantanamo Bay for 14 years, was different
articles.content: When Tahar Rahim opened the script for The Mauritanian and saw the word Guantanamo, his heart sank. I thought it could be the same stereotypical part that I had been offered from Hollywood for the pa… [+7925 chars]

articles.author: James Brinsford
articles.title: Alex Beresford subjected to Ofcom complaints for 'taking Piers Morgan's seat' - Mirror Online
articles.description: Good Morning Britain viewers have complained to TV watchdog Ofcom after Alex Beresford replaced Piers Morgan in presenting the breakfast show with Kate Garraway after their on-screen argument
articles.content:
Alex Beresford has been the subject of a flurry of complaints to TV watchdog Ofcom after he sat in for Piers Morgan on Good Morning Britain following Piers' dramatic exit.
Alex presented the ITV bre… [+3292 chars]
